about_the_game:
Of Lies and Rain is a story-driven first-person shooter built exclusively for VR. Set in a dark, sci-fi, post-apocalyptic world, you’ll fight to reclaim your past and save humanity from the brink of extinction.

September 7, 2048

The world you once knew is gone, and so is your memory. An unfamiliar voice urges you to defeat A.D.E., the AI behind the long lasting 20-year war that has driven humanity into hiding beneath the Earth. The surface is now ruled by hostile machines, new lifeforms fighting for their survival. Just like everyone else.

To defeat A.D.E., you must wield your powers. Abilities that grant access to a new plane of reality: Worlds within technology, within a world shattered by it.

Journey through a dystopian tale where nothing is as it seems, and the line between friend and foe has never been so thin. Battle through a ravaged world to save what remains of humanity’s future.

Features

  • Uncover the truth behind the world’s destruction and those responsible for humanity’s downfall.

  • Explore the life of a survivor through memories hidden throughout the world.

  • Traverse interconnected real and digital worlds, blurring the lines between biological and digital consciousness.

  • Fight your way through a ruined world, fending off hostile machines—each with unique abilities.

  • Wield weapons with distinct and innovative designs, each crafted to offer a unique combat experience.

  • Solve the riddles blocking your path and push forward to meet your destiny.

content_descriptors.notes: We wanted to depict a post-apocaliptyc, devastated world where humanity is collapsing. A world like this is a violent one. People are drawn to cannibilism and Violence against each other in order to survive. There is no sexual content in "Of Lies and Rain".
